data.title: From 'Rowing With The Wind' to 'Then Came You': Here Are Top 5 Movies of Elizabeth Hurley
meta_keywords: austin powers: international man of mystery
data.meta_description: Elizabeth Hurley, the captivating British actress, has been a silver-screen sensation since the late '90s. With hits like 'Rowing With The Wind' and 'Passenger 57,' she shows her versatility in romantic comedies and period dramas. Take a look at the top 5 movies of Hurley here.
data.text:
Synopsis

Elizabeth Hurley, the captivating British actress, has been a silver-screen sensation since the late '90s. With hits like 'Rowing With The Wind' and 'Passenger 57,' she shows her versatility in romantic comedies and period dramas. Take a look at the top 5 movies of Hurley here.

The stunning Elizabeth Hurley has consistently enchanted her fans with the allure of her movies. The British actress has graced the silver screen since the late '90s.

#Budget' 2024 with ET

Union Budget and Economic Survey 2024 Live Updates

Economic Survey Highlights: Reading between the lines

Economic Survey on if India can fill mfg void left by China

Over the decades, she has delivered various hits, including 'Rowing With The Wind,' 'Passenger 57,' 'The Long Winter,' and many others.

Hurley has proven her adaptability across a range of film genres, showcasing her skills in romantic comedies and period dramas.

Born on June 10, 1965, she is renowned for her standout roles as Vanessa Kensington in Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery (1997) and as the Devil in Bedazzled (2000).

One of the first big-budget movies Hurley became a part of was 'Passenger 57,' released in 1992. The movie was a hit among the audience, and since then, the actress has not looked back.

Let's take a closer look at the top 5 movies of Elizabeth Hurley that were adored by her fans

1. Rowing With The Wind

Released in 1988, the movie featured Hugh Grant, Elizabeth Hurley, and Lizzy Mclnerny. The film presents a fictionalized telling of Mary Shelley's story.

It revolves around a famous author who travels to Switzerland with her partner and a few close associates. Along the way, the author writes Frankenstein, and several difficulties follow.

Elizabeth Hurley portrays Claire Clairmont, the stepsister of Mary Clairemont. The film's admirers argue that it tells a compelling story based on actual historical events, and Hurley is excellent in her supporting role.

2. The Long Winter

Released in the early 1990s, this French and Spanish film focuses on the events of the Spanish Civil War, centering on a family during wartime.

Elizabeth played the role of Emma Stapleton, keeping her fans hooked until the last frame.

3. Then Came You

Released on September 30, 2020, the movie features Kathie Lee Gifford, Craig Ferguson, Elizabeth Hurley, Brett James, and others.

Falling under the rom-com category, the film revolves around Annabelle and Howard as the main characters.

After losing her husband, Annabelle pays a visit to Howard's inn in Scotland, and the two quickly become close. Elizabeth portrays the role of Clare, Howard's fiancée.

4. Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery

Released on May 02, 1997, the movie cost a whopping $16.5 million to produce.

Helmed by Jay Roach, the movie features Mike Myers, Elizabeth Hurley, Seth Green, and others.

Falling under the satire category, it is one of the best and most iconic movies of Elizabeth Hurley.

5. Permanent Midnight

Falling under the indie category, this autobiographical film was released in the 1990s. Elizabeth played the role of Sandra Stahl.

The movie features an ensemble cast of comedic actors, including Owen Wilson, Janeane Garofalo, and Fred Willard.

The actress's career is highlighted by films such as Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery and Bedazzled.

One of the most endearing characters in Austin Powers, according to some fans, is Vanessa Kensington, played by Elizabeth Hurley.

FAQs:

Q1: What is Elizabeth Hurley's net worth?

A1. Elizabeth Hurley’s net worth is $50 Million.

Q2: What is Elizabeth Hurley's age?

A2. Elizabeth Hurley is 58 years old.
